title: Cargo! The Quest for Gravity
notes:
Overall it is very much playable.
Performance is lower then on Windows.
It seems that fps does not depend on graphics settings. Both Low and High settings gives 13-20 fps underwater and 25-60 fps in other places.
The more your play session is the more are random fps drops. Sometimes it stays on 1 fps for several seconds.
It seems that fps is more stable with PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 but sound becomes cracked sometimes.

MusicTool does not run and gives a message ".NET Framework 2.0 is not installed".
specs: Core2 Duo E8200 / GeForce GTX 750 Ti
